results.title: Simvastatin Hydroxy Acid Fails to Attain Sufficient Central Nervous System Tumor Exposure to Achieve a Cytotoxic Effect: Results of a Preclinical Cerebral Microdialysis Study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ is rapidly metabolized in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ plasma with 15 times lower exposure compared with @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ plasma. @<m>CHEMICAL_simvastatin_acid</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C063287 @@@SVA@@@ exposure in tECF was <33.8 +- 11.9 microg/l per hour, whereas the @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ to plasma partition coefficient of @<m>CHEMICAL_simvastatin_acid</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C063287 @@@SVA@@@ was <0.084 +- 0.008.

citations.NLM: Patel YT, Jacus MO, Davis AD, Boulos N, Turner DC, Vuppala PK, Freeman BB 3rd, Gilbertson RJ, Stewart CF. Simvastatin Hydroxy Acid Fails to Attain Sufficient Central Nervous System Tumor Exposure to Achieve a Cytotoxic Effect: Results of a Preclinical Cerebral Microdialysis Study. Drug Metab Dispos. 2016 Apr;44(4):591-4. PMID: 26802130
